name: Square Pair
description:
Square Pair is a Puzzle Platformer where you need to press buttons to open doors by controlling two squares, but you can disconnect the little square and control it independently. You´re also able to jump when you´re alone, and you can shoot enemies if you´re joined together.

This game was created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The Theme was “Joined together”.

How to Play:

  • Your goal is to OPEN ALL THE DOORS.
  • You do that by PRESSING THE BUTTON in the same colour as the door.
  • Disconnect the little square by pressing the space bar.
  • You can jump if you´re alone, and shoot if you´re joined together.

 Controls:

  • A / D – Move left and right
  • Space bar – Disconnect the little square
  • W – Jump if you control the little square
  • F – Shoot if you´re joined together.

Credits:

This game was created in Unity, I made all the assets myself except for the font.
